thread.title: Jerry Seinfeld's Daughter Sascha Looks All Grown up in Sheer Lace Dress at 25th Birthday Bash - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Jerry Seinfeld's Daughter Sascha Looks All Grown up in Sheer Lace Dress at 25th Birthday Bash - NewsBreak

author: Meredith Gordon
title: Jerry Seinfeld's Daughter Sascha Looks All Grown up in Sheer Lace Dress at 25th Birthday Bash - NewsBreak
text:
By Meredith Gordon ,
33 minutes ago
Sascha Seinfeld is all grown up.
The stunning eldest child (and only daughter) of comedian Jerry Seinfeld and wife, cookbook author Jessica Seinfeld , left little to the imagination as she celebrated her 25th birthday in style. The writer, who graduated from Duke University in 2023, shared a gorgeous series of photos from her epic birthday celebration, including her barely-there party look.
â€œNot really a big birthday person,â€ Sascha Seinfeld captioned her social media post ironically, as she shared a series of photos from her celebrationâ€”including a sweet snap of her mid-party hug with her mom and dad.
In the photos, Sascha can be seen wearing a completely sheer, short black lace dress with a black bra and bottoms to keep from revealing her birthday suit at her birthday party. The 25-year-old showed off her enviable figure and looked comfortable in her elegant but revealing party ensemble.
In the pictures, Sascha is surrounded by friends, beaming from ear to ear. A good time was had by all, even Jerryâ€”who undoubtedly left his daughterâ€™s birthday party with enough new material to stage a new one-hour comedy special.
Sascha Seinfeldâ€™s 25th Birthday Celebration @jimgaffigan The time we have with our children. #jerryseinfeld #emptynest #parents
â™¬ original sound - Jim Gaffigan Sascha Seinfeldâ€™s post garnered supportive comments from friends and even pals of her dadâ€™s, all noting Saschaâ€™s â€œhotâ€ birthday look.
â€œHoly lawd!â€ wrote comedian Amy Schumer , whoâ€™s having her own hot Instagram moment thanks to recent photos depicting her stunning weight loss transformation .
Writer Amy Griffin wrote, â€œSmokinâ€™ Sascha.â€
Comedian Ali Wentworth added, â€œEpic.â€
While Sascha was the life of the party celebrating her big birthday, Jerry and Jessica Seinfeldâ€™s eldest is also carving her own path as a writer. A writer and junior editor at The Free Press , she regularly publishes commentary on pop culture, entertainment, and media.
Jerry and Jessica Seinfeld are also parents to sons Julian (22), who graduated from Duke in May 2025, and Shepherd (20), a sophomore at Duke.
